soa2-notloggedin: Message that redirects to login page. A "Return to Special:ScratchOAuth2/login" message follows it.
soa2-vercode-explanation: Instructions for user verification. $1 is the "your profile" link.
soa2-new-app: Action link for new app, also title of such page
soa2-no-app-title: Error page title when no application can be found
soa2-no-app: Error when application cannot be found. $1 is the app ID.
soa2-app-secret: Table header for client secret (with nbsp to not wrap)
soa2-app-deletion-confirm: Confirmation message for deleting an app
soa2-unnamed-app: Placeholder for name of app when app is unnamed
soa2-unmoderated-app: Placeholder for name of app when the name is not yet moderated
soa2-auth-title: Title of Special:ScratchOAuth2/authorize. $1 is the app name.
soa2-auth-desc: Question part of auth flow. $1 is the (escaped) app name.
soa2-auth-invalid-title: Title of Special:ScratchOAuth2/authorize when parameter validation fails
soa2-auth-invalid: Error message when parameter validation fails
soa2-auth-cancelled-title: Title of Special:ScratchOAuth2/authorize after clicking Cancel
